item.description:
**If you haven't rsvp'd yet and are still interested in going, please email me and I will send you my cell phone**

Harpoon's summer festival of beer and bands. This Harpoon two-day, annual event is held annually in early June. Outside and under tents, we celebrate the coming of summer with Harpoon beer fresh from the brewery and great local music from some of the area's best up and coming bands..

What is The Harpoon Summer Session?

A celebration of the best of Summer, Fresh beer and live music
Boston's Harpoon Brewery offers the ideal outdoor venue for celebrating summer
A wide selection of different styles of fresh beer from Harpoon and UFO
Delicious food sold by a variety of vendors

Come sit back, relax and enjoy the summer with friends at the Harpoon Brewery
Featuring popular Boston up and coming bands?everything from Rock to Reggae
Door charge $15.00 and includes a souvenir Pint Cup (does not include food or beer)
Must be 21 or older and have proper I.D.
Cash bars offer a selection of Harpoon & UFO for $5.00 a pint
Plenty capacity, come anytime!
TICKETS NOT SOLD IN ADVANCE

Friends of Harpoon get 2 for one on Friday night only. Sign up at http://friendofharpoo... Trust me, you want to sign up for FOH! You also get some really good deals throughout the whole year!

Website for more info:
http://www.harpoonbre...
item.how_to_find_us: **Change of plans: we will meet inside Clarke's in south station.** Please see message below.
item.why: Fresh beer and summertime, why the heck not?!
item.name: Harpoon Summer Session
